codeSystems.name: USCoreCarePlanCategoryExtensionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core CarePlan Category Extension Codes
codeSystems.description: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core CarePlan Profile. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR ValueSet.

codeSystems.name: USCoreConditionCategoryExtensionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Condition Category Extension Codes
codeSystems.description: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core Condition Profile. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR and US Core value sets.

codeSystems.name: USCoreCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Category
codeSystems.description: Category codes used across US Core Profiles and resource types. They are typically used when there is a need for categorization for searching and finding resources or workflow hints.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDocumentReferencesCategoryCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core DocumentReferences Category Codes
codeSystems.description: The US Core DocumentReferences Type Code System is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing DocumentReference Resources.

codeSystems.name: USCoreProvenancePaticipantTypeExtensionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Provenance Participant Type Extension Codes
codeSystems.description: Set of codes that are needed for implementation of the US-Core Provenance Profile. These codes are used as extensions to the FHIR value sets.
